data.eml:eml: Two new species of Rhodacaridae (Mesostigmata: Rhodacaroidea) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castilho, Raphael C., Jalaeian, Mahdi, De, Gilberto J. (2012): Two new species of Rhodacaridae (Mesostigmata: Rhodacaroidea) from Iran. Zootaxa 3248: 35-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213008
